message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product that could be a game-changer for your business. While I can't disclose all the details, I can assure you its worth is no less than $1500000. I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $1800000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to secure a powerful asset at a competitive price. Please consider this offer carefully, as it won't be available for long.
